title: Is Travis Scott considered a legendary hip-hop artist? - Quora

response.answer_text: He's in the Chief Keef, Soulja Boy, Playboicarti area of “Not recognized for skill persay, but they ARE pioneers to a bigger movement”. The same way the person who invented the lightbulb didn't defend America by jumping in front of a nuke or something is still regarded as extremely important. They're not legendary, they're inventors.
